Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitGymCustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymCustomerBusiness
public interface FlipFitGymCustomerInterface
Interface for FlipFit gym customer operations.

  • Method Details

    • addGymCustomer

      void addGymCustomer(int userId)
      Adds a new gym customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be added as a gym customer.

    • setPreferredCity

      void setPreferredCity(int userId, String city)
      Sets the preferred city for a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the customer.
      city - The preferred city to set for the customer.

    • bookSlot

      void bookSlot(int userId, int slotId)
      Books a slot for a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the customer.
      slotId - The ID of the slot to be booked.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId)
      Cancels a booking for a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • listAllCentersByCity

      void listAllCentersByCity(String city)
      Lists all gym centers in a specified city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city for which the gym centers need to be listed.

    • viewAvailableSlots

      void viewAvailableSlots(int gymCenterId)
      Views the available slots for a specified gym center.
      Parameters:
      gymCenterId - The ID of the gym center.

    • viewBookedSlots

      void viewBookedSlots(int userId)
      Views the slots booked by a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the customer whose bookings are to be viewed.

    • processPayment

      void processPayment(int customerId, double amount)
      Processes a payment for a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer making the payment.
      amount - The amount to be processed.

    • refundPayment

      boolean refundPayment(int paymentId)
      Refunds a payment made by a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The ID of the payment to be refunded.
      Returns:
      true if the payment was successfully refunded, false otherwise.

    • getPaymentStatus

      String getPaymentStatus(int paymentId)
      Gets the status of a payment.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The ID of the payment whose status is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The status of the payment as a string.

    • sendNotification

      void sendNotification(int customerId, String notification)
      Sends a notification to a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to receive the notification.
      notification - The content of the notification.
